about_me.des: I am a graduate candidate at UBC okanagan. My current research is on Deep Learning and Computer Vision.

projects.duamen: Digital long-scroll painting of the palace museum in Duanmen
projects.minghuaji: MingHuaJi website of the Palace Museum

career.intel_des: As an intern of computer vision in Intel Research Lab, research on the area of Face Verification based on Deep Learning.
career.bjut_des: As an undergraduate student, my major is Computer Science.
career.hydata_des: In Hydata, I joined in a apartment for developing a data visiualizing platform .
career.bjut_des: I backed to my university for the job of research assistant, researched on traffic sign recognition.
career.ubco: University of British Columbia in Okanagan
career.ubco_des: I started my graduate student life in UBCO, my major is Eletronic Engineer.
